git_rationale.why_issue_occurred: Google Maps MCP was not converted to skill structure
git_rationale.how_fix_addresses_root: Converted MCP to proper skill structure in .claude/skills/ following progressive disclosure pattern

dev.qa_notes: Verify all 6 agents can invoke /google-maps skill and access tool categories. Test progressive disclosure by loading each category separately.

permissions_to_add.reason: Allow invocation of google-maps skill by all agents

recommendations: Configure GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY environment variable in MCP server config
Enable Places API, Routes API, and Geocoding API in Google Cloud Console
Implement rate limiting and caching for API quota management
Monitor API usage and costs during testing phase
Consider upgrading to paid tier if free quota exceeded
Test fallback to WebSearch when MCP unavailable
